Problems and Workarounds

If you find a problem using BrowserLauncher2, please report it. If YOU don't report it, we don't know about it, and we can't fix it.

Windows Problems

  • Anchors and Local Files with Default Browser
  • Anchors and Local Files with IE 7

Anchors and Local Files with Default Browser

Windows strips anchors from local file urls when you request the url using the default browser. This problem only affects local file urls. Http urls do not suffer from this problem. You can get around this problem by using browser targetting.

Anchors and Local Files with IE 7

It has been reported that IE 7 does not support/honor anchors on local file urls. There is no workaround for this other than using a different browser.
